thread.title: $23 -- Toronto: Hall of Fame Hockey Classic w/Gilmour
thread.title_full: $23 -- Toronto: Hall of Fame Hockey Classic w/Gilmour

title: $23 -- Toronto: Hall of Fame Hockey Classic w/Gilmour
text:
Hockey Hall of Fame 
A clash of Canada Legends versus World Legends, see Toronto Maple Leafs alum Doug Gilmour and "The Russian Rocket" Pavel Bure captain two all-star teams at the annual Haggar Hockey Hall of Fame Legends Classic . This exclusive deal saves 25% on tickets. 
Lower Level Red seats are available for $22.50 (reg. $30) for the game on Sunday, Nov. 8, at 3 p.m. at the Air Canada Centre. Each ticket also includes a complimentary souvenir collectible program. 
Festivities include the pregame Official Honoured Member Blazer Ceremony for the 2015 inductees -- Sergei Fedorov, Bill Hay, Phil Housley, Peter Karmanos Jr., Nicklas Lidstrom, Chris Pronger and Angela Ruggiero. 
The star-studded rosters include 16 honoured members, 10 NHL captains, 29 Stanley Cup rings and 40 Olympic/World gold medals. Toronto Maple Leafs alum slated to play include Wendel Clark, Gary Leeman,­ Dmitri Mironov, ­Larry Murphy, Borje Salming, Darryl Sitter, ­Rick Vaive and Tiger Williams. Toronto: Hall of Fame Hockey Classic w/Gilmour $ $23 Sunday, Nov. 8, at 3 p.m. $23 -- Toronto: Hall of Fame Hockey Classic w/Gilmour * Tweet By Pamela Bartlett

Lower Level Red seats are available for $22.50 (reg. $30) for the game on Sunday, Nov. 8, at 3 p.m. at the Air Canada Centre. Each ticket also includes a complimentary souvenir collectible program. 
Festivities include the pregame Official Honoured Member Blazer Ceremony for the 2015 inductees -- Sergei Fedorov, Bill Hay, Phil Housley, Peter Karmanos Jr., Nicklas Lidstrom, Chris Pronger and Angela Ruggiero. 
The star-studded rosters include 16 honoured members, 10 NHL captains, 29 Stanley Cup rings and 40 Olympic/World gold medals. Toronto Maple Leafs alum slated to play include Wendel Clark, Gary Leeman,­ Dmitri Mironov, ­Larry Murphy, Borje Salming, Darryl Sitter, ­Rick Vaive and Tiger Williams. Book by Oct. 19.
